ygData.subject: RE: Song Analysis?
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe John is working on one.  He has posted a couple of excerpts so far. Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
ygData.messageBody:
I believe John is working on one. He has posted a couple of excerpts so
far.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti

>From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Song Analysis?
>Date: Fri, 8 Oct 1999 10:51:51 -0600
>
>This is slightly off topic, but....
>
>I used to talk with Goatnatos quite a bit. In fact, we fought a couple of
>times together way back in the "olden days" in Misty Thicket. However, I
>strongly believe that Goatnatos has quite playing EQ all together, or that
>he's moved onto another character class. I haven't seen him in Norrath in
>over 3 months now.
>
>Even more off topic...
>
>I am going to make a proposal to the "Concert Hall" and "Songs of Norrath"
>to make the definitive Song Analysis. Basically, I'm going to try and
>convince everyone to send me their analysis of the songs and then I'll try
>to mush them all together. Might need someone to help me put it into HTML
>format. I was also considering trying to slap together a definitive Bard
>Guide as well.... I see so many great tips, tricks, twists, strategies,
>etc,
>etc - It would be nice to get them all together.
>
>Desmei Sightblinder
>Lvl 28 Bard (Povar)
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Jens Ameskamp [mailto:ngollon@...]
>Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 8:46 AM
>To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>Subject: [eqbards] Song Analysis?
>
>
>From: Jens Ameskamp <ngollon@...>
>
>Hoi!
>

>Analysis: v2.0

>Tilolian
